pgTitle: List of World War II ships

rows.text: sold to Italy as Enrico Tazzoli 1954, scrapped 1973
Returned to USN 12 February 1946, scrapped May 1946
returned to USN 4 January 1946, stricken 19 June 1946, renamed Raki
decommissioned 1 May 1976, preserved as museum ship
Decommissioned 11 January 1951, sold to Argentina. Scrapped 1978
sank 2 November 1943 after ramming and sinking U-405
to UK 8 October 1940 as HMS Beverly
Decommissioned 3 January 1947, sold to Chile. Sank in Pacific 1992
